summary: This document details the settlement statement for a real estate transaction involving the sale of a property located at 338 East Washington Road, Bradford, NH. It includes signatures from the buyer, seller, and settlement agent, along with financial details of the transaction, including amounts due and settlement charges.

persons.name: Jeffrey W. Roberts
persons.context: Jeffrey W. Roberts is identified as the manager of Granite Reality LLC, the buyer in the real estate transaction.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is the trustee of the Richard Yospin Family Trust, which is the seller of the property.

persons.name: Rebecca Russo
persons.context: Rebecca Russo is identified as the preparer of the real estate transfer tax declaration.

connections.description: Richard Yospin, as trustee of the Richard Yospin Family Trust, sold the property to Granite Reality LLC.
Jeffrey W. Roberts is the manager of Granite Reality LLC, which is the buyer in the transaction.
Rebecca Russo prepared the real estate transfer tax declaration for Richard Yospin.

events.title: Real Estate Transaction Closing
events.description: The closing of the real estate transaction for the property located at 338 East Washington Road, Bradford, NH, took place.

keyFacts: The property was sold for a contract sales price of $1,070,750.
Settlement charges to the buyer totaled $11,863.35.
Richard Yospin is the trustee of the Richard Yospin Family Trust, which sold the property.
The transaction included various adjustments for taxes and proration of utilities.
The settlement date and disbursement date for the transaction was December 13, 2019.
